A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hands down the worst Star Wars movie ever made. Trust Disney to screw Star Wars\, don't know what they were thinking. To elaborate without spoilers is that everything is wrong\, plot/character development/forced humor/general direction etc you name it and this movie has issues. the only reason critics liked it is because its different. well i guess these critics are not true star wars fans. i mean Disney had a whole slew of titles/story lines to take inspiration from and yet they screwed it up big time. this movie is even worse than the phantom menace and that is saying something.
